name: Gunball (itch)
description:
This is a pinball game inspired by the many games in the genre that came out on Gameboy and the Gameboy Color, made for the Gameboy Jam of October 2015.

Unfortunately, because of reasons, I wasn't able to fully finish the game. So I released it in a semi-finished state with a lot of feature/content missing. Hope you'll still enjoy it ! :)

Commands:

  • Up/Down/Enter - Navigate in the menu
  • Left/Right - Use the flipper
